message:
hey i'm working on project thats collect data from many sites 

the problem is sites have different names for the same thing is there a way to detect the different names for the same object automatically
ex  iphone black 64 gb
     iphone white 64 gb
     iphone black 32 gb unlocked AT&T
how to make get all this data under the same object ?

data.message: You need to learn more about data mining algorithms, for example a cosine similarity would help to match texts http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosine_similarity
there are a lot of open source projects on github about scrapers you should check them.
